Source.Name: kanshi
Source.Summary: kanshi allows you to define output profiles for sway that are automatically enabled and disabled on hotplug. For instance, this can be used to turn a laptop's internal screen off when docked.
Source.Description: kanshi allows you to define output profiles for sway that are automatically enabled and disabled on hotplug. For instance, this can be used to turn a laptop's internal screen off when docked.
